title: Fully Funded Scholarship at University of Central Florida
content: We are thrilled to share that another student from iCodeGuru has secured a fully funded Ph.D. position at the University of Central Florida (UCF)! This opportunity includes full tuition sponsorship, a generous stipend, conference travel funding, and access to cutting-edge research facilities. At iCodeGuru, we are committed to providing free mentorship, courses, and guidance to help students build strong profiles and secure life-changing scholarships worldwide.

title: Announcement - Courses, Workshops & Webinar
content: iCodeGuru is excited to bring its students amazing opportunities: IELTS Prep for Scholarships, Advance WordPress Engineering BootCamp, Chrome Extension Workshop, Firebase Workshop, and a webinar on Scaling Tech Careers Beyond Borders.

title: Afsheen Ghuman's Fully Funded Scholarship Success
content: Afsheen Ghuman has secured a fully funded scholarship from GIFT University to Grand Valley State University, USA. Afsheen transformed her profile in just four months through strategic learning, teaching sessions, and active hackathon participation.

title: First Urdu Large Language Model Released
content: Urdu's first LLM, Alif-1.0, has been released on Hugging Face. Built by Muhammad Arham and the LARGE team, this model outperforms existing multilingual models and democratizes AI access for Urdu speakers.

title: Safia Fiaz Achieves 7.5 Band in IELTS
content: Safia Fiaz, a learner at iCodeGuru, achieved an impressive Overall Band 7.5 in the IELTS Academic Test with just two weeks of preparation. Her strategy included practicing Cambridge IELTS books and utilizing YouTube resources.

title: AI for Connectivity Hackathon Victory
content: iCodeGuru students Malik Zubair, Hamna Dawood, Bakht Ullah Jan, and Sohaib Aamir emerged as winners in the AI for Connectivity Hackathon by lablab.ai. Their project focused on forecasting network connectivity using AI models.

title: Upcoming Courses and Workshops
content: New courses announced: Web Development Unleashed, Mathematics for AI, IoT Smart Solutions, and React Bootcamp. Special webinar: Pathway to US Immigration (O1-A Talent Visa) by Sarim Nadeem.

title: Australia Awards Scholarships Webinar
content: Webinar titled 'Achieve Your Dreams: Australia Awards Scholarships for International Students' featuring guest speaker Komal Fatima.

title: Umar Mazhar Achieves 6.5 Band in IELTS
content: Umar Mazhar scored 6.5 Band in IELTS Academic, balancing university commitments and preparation. His success was supported by iCodeGuru's free resources and mentorship.

title: Fall 2024 Fully Funded Scholarships in USA Results
content: iCodeGuru students have secured fully funded scholarships in 18 USA universities including McGill, University of Utah, and Kansas State University. Profiles include CGPA 3.1-3.8, IELTS 6.5-7.5, and $0 bank statements.
